ServiceInfoRespSuggestion.name: ServiceInfoRespSuggestion
ServiceInfoRespSuggestion.description: Represents suggestions in a service information response. For example, suggesting a change in medication dosage.

LastReferencedDate.description: The date when the record was last referenced.

LastViewedDate.description: The date when the record was last viewed.

Name.description: The name of the service information response suggestion.
